Quote.Author: Ursula Andress
Quote.QuoteValue: I take care of my flowers and my cats. And enjoy food. And that's living

Quote.Author: Ursula Andress
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a decorator. I wanted to interior design homes and do everything myself

Quote.Author: Ursula Andress
Quote.QuoteValue: It's going to be over soon, so I don't really have time to get busy

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: To light a candle is to cast a shadow

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: If science fiction is the mythology of modern technology, then its myth is tragic

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: What sane person could live in this world and not be crazy?

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got some gift for languages. You follow your gift. But Latin's not easy

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no right answers to wrong questions

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: When action grows unprofitable, gather information; when information grows unprofitable, sleep

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: It is above all by the imagination that we achieve perception and compassion and hope

Quote.Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote.QuoteValue: The only questions that really matter are the ones you ask yourself

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of legends, a lot of people, have come before me. But this is my time

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think limits

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: There are better starters than me but I'm a strong finisher

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: Repeating is harder than anything else

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like losing anyways

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: When people see your personality come out, they feel so good, like they actually know who you are

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: Come on... when you're running, if you see you're going to win, you're going to celebrate

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: My name is Bolt, Lightning Bolt

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: I work hard, and I do good, and I'm going to enjoy myself. I'm not going to let you restrict me

Quote.Author: Usain Bolt
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as I'm in great shape, nobody beats me, for sure

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a flamboyant type of guy, a cooler version of Liberace

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: The best present a man can give a woman is his undivided attention

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleeping is forbidden at the age of 22. It's all work and no play

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: Down time is not the name of the game

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a woman who takes care of herself - it says something about the way she'll care for me

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: My philosophy is I'm raising future adults, not children

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't fake being a star. But you can also become a great personality

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learnt that you are who you are, and in the end, if you don't believe it, then no one will

Quote.Author: Usher
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of artistry has always been 'try everything until you find out what works.'

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't go to England because they won't let my dog in

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: Working with Brando was fun. It was like a tennis match. We played unbelievably well together

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bad liar; I don't know what to say backstage

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a bourgeois existence, you shouldn't be an actor. You're in the wrong profession

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: Awards don't really mean much

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have disassociated myself from that book

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love going to the movies; I love watching good movie actors. They must know something I don't

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love playing Chekhov. That's the hardest; that's why I love it most

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: Marlon was so sensitive, you thought the poor guy just had a bad education

Quote.Author: Uta Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe the one I enjoyed playing most was A Month in the Country

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not like a gorgeous bombshell or anything like that

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is in motion, as it seems

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans are somehow obsessed with her, and something about me hit a spot with people in Japan

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: I get strangely obsessed about the cleanliness of my house

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: I squeeze oranges every morning to make juice

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: There really aren't any completely Asian people singing right now

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, it's an experiment to see what people are gonna think of it

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never really enjoy being famous

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: When people ask me exactly how much time I spend in each country, I always tell them I have no idea

Quote.Author: Utada Hikaru
Quote.QuoteValue: In Japan, people don't really sing about sexual content

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: Interview with a Vampire was lots of sex, so I'm not sure

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: Homer is the nice side of Al Bundy with the same intellect. I really like him and Al Bundy

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the Matrix effect is over-used and I don't do it anymore

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: My favourite game is Postal because it is so politically incorrect

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: I boxed 15 years in a club

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: If people hate me they hate me

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: I produce for a low price and I sell it on my own to 80 countries

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors don't have real value

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: Alone is a much better film than House of the Dead and better than most horror movies out today

Quote.Author: Uwe Boll
Quote.QuoteValue: I play PC and Xbox games at home, and I just got a PSP as a birthday present

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: It is important not to trust people too much

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: I know my father and my mother, but beyond that I cannot go. My ancestry is blurred

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is short. I can't listen to banality

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is always in movement

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a small place and left it when I was quite young and entered the bigger world

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: But everything of value about me is in my books

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: The biography of a writer - or even the autobiography - will always have this incompleteness

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: What was past was past. I suppose that was the general attitude

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: I read a piece of writing and within a paragraph or two I know whether it is by a woman or not

Quote.Author: V. S. Naipaul
Quote.QuoteValue: If ever you wish to meet intellectual frauds in quantity, go to Paris

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Without deadlines and restrictions I just tend to become preoccupied with other things

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the first time that I've ever had an art show based on a film, but it's a photography collage

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Mark Twain is as big as America. He really is

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: My perception is that I've never done anything but work really hard

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Why do women get paid less money? It doesn't make any sense

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Mark Twain had a way of telling stories that shifts your consciousness away from labels

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Daryl Hannah likes to goof around with fashion, but she does have pretty impeccable taste

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not an American; I am the American

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look up the definition of news in the dictionary, it isn't what you watch on TV

Quote.Author: Val Kilmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The first play I saw was a Samuel Beckett play which was great

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I race to win. If I am on the bike or in a car it will always be the same

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a great motorbike racer, the most important thing is passion for the bike

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: My normal life is like being on holiday

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like being famous - it is like a prison. And driving for Ferrari would make it far worse

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: How do Ferrari know what I'm doing next year when I don't know what I'm doing next week?

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I would have probably stolen cars - it would have given me the same adrenaline rush as racing

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I always enjoyed myself a lot in pre-school

Quote.Author: Valentino Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Valentino Rossi. And I want to be a person, not an icon

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is very sexy

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether to let it affect you or not

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a food addict, that's my downfall

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: My eyes aren't special, my nose isn't special, my mouth isn't special

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: The only things I really love about myself physically are my ankles and my hair

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought, If I'm so afraid of a bikini, there's something wrong. And so I had to get back into one!

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: We all have our painful pasts we have to get through

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I have faith in faith. God is there, whether we have faith or not, so why not have faith in him?

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Ed is very sexy because his emotions are really there - not forced

Quote.Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a full-time mom right now and a part-time actress

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: There are just so many funny kids and teenagers. They're just not aware of how funny they are

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: Being sick is the reason I went into comedy

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: With 'Trainwreck,' because it wasn't live and we could do more takes, I feel like we broke a lot

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: People think New York is crazy and busy, but it's actually a great place for lazy people to live

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually meditate twice a day: Transcendental Meditation

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can stay up watching TV so late

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: I sleep a lot on Sunday. It's really great

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: There always have been funny women

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: Cleveland gets crapped on a lot

Quote.Author: Vanessa Bayer
Quote.QuoteValue: The longer you're on a show like 'SNL,' the less frequent the Google alerts become

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be able to love yourself because that's when things fall into place

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: So many people try to grow up too fast, and it's not fun! You should stay a kid as long as possible!

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: I get to go to all these beautiful places, so it's nice being able to take pictures of it

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence is key. Sometimes, you need to look like you're confident even when you're not

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not just look at your boyfriend as just a boyfriend. Look at him as a friend, too

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't go long without eating. I never starve myself: I grab a healthy snack

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: I have three closets in my bedroom

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: I like someone who's not afraid to be a kid!

Quote.Author: Vanessa Hudgens
Quote.QuoteValue: I love funky styles. Not preppy or rock, just funky!

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: I will be the Thai equivalent of Eddie the Eagle

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: Violin playing is a physical art with great traditions behind it

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: In an ideal world, I'd spend every weekend at my home in Zermatt in Switzerland

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: Beethoven and Beatles, Mozart and Michael Jackson, Paganini and Prince - I like them all

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: But I still think it's mind over matter in the sense that if you're strong, you can combat anything

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is about the performance

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: But I don't think I've grown up to be a damaged adult

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: All the time I'm changing as an artist and as a person

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind about the boos from the audience

Quote.Author: Vanessa Mae
Quote.QuoteValue: Music will always be my greatest passion

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is like the ocean, it goes up and down

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: I realize how unique my path has been. And I'm thankful for that

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the strongest and most fragile thing we have in life

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have the recipe for happiness, but I think the engine is simply having the desire

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate, for example, whenever you hear someone say, 'You have work at being a couple.'

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: I liked to play dress-up

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: When you meet the love of your life, it's just obvious and natural and easier

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear can make all of us do the wrong things sometimes

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: My daughter loves singing above all else

Quote.Author: Vanessa Paradis
Quote.QuoteValue: I mostly want to be friends with my children

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any reason to hate anybody; I believe in good karma and spreading good energy

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: Negativity spreads faster than any Justin Bieber song

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Christian, but I don't believe in religion or anything like that

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: It wasn't until '94 when I tried to commit suicide that I realized that it wasn't about the money

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been known to hang out and party back in the day. I had a weekend that lasted a few years

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: Rap is from the streets and I'm from the streets. That's why a lot of people accept me

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never met anybody in this world like me

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn from my mistakes and you don't have to make them yourself

Quote.Author: Vanilla Ice
Quote.QuoteValue: Even in a bad market, location, location, location is a way to still buy and sell property

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day, I wake up and say, 'Good Morning, Jesus.'

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: A girl's best friend is her pride

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: I repent daily my sins, my faults, and my shortcomings

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting past my past... was a process, a very serious process indeed

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing to Jesus for Jesus now. This gives me pure joy... worship!

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: I apologize profusely to those I have offended deeply a million times over

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: According to God's word, we haven't done a very good job concerning our little ones, nor our teens

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Vanity' means worthlessness

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: Vanity was a joke. She was an image created to make money

Quote.Author: Vanity
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm totally comfortable with myself

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course, I want to be number one. But being happy and healthy is the most important thing

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Interior design is a business of trust

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to be slim and you know, I actually can lose weight quicker than I can gain it

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: It wasn't like I was self-motivated. My dad started me. It was his dream before it was mine

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess rumors are more exciting than the truth

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone makes their own comments. That's how rumors get started

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always found the rain very calming

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not a competitor, you've just got to go home

Quote.Author: Venus Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Oh and Oh' is a tennis term... It's a nice way of saying you took your opponent to pieces

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm part wood nymph. I require mountains and warm, dense patches of moss to thrive

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I look for struggle in the roles I choose - struggle and perseverance

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the best husband a wife could possibly have. He's the best father my children could have

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I attract roles that are necessary either for personal growth or enlightenment

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't grow up watching film but as a Ukrainian-American, music and stories and dance are crucial

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: Editing is not a part of the filmmaking process I've ever been privy to as an actress

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: Normally, I rely heavily on my director to massage me out of my actor comfort zones

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: In the quiet moments, the discoveries are made

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I think maybe I was a shepherdess in a past life

Quote.Author: Vera Farmiga
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from the school of, 'if you want more, you have to require more from yourself.'

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman is never sexier than when she is comfortable in her clothes

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: As the mother of two daughters, I have great respect for women. And I don't ever want to lose that

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was extremely controlled, sort of flawless. And I always tend to be a bit more hippie

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to balance everything. It's always challenging

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a girl who likes to go out to lunch or cocktails or store openings

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the gritty parts of fashion, the design, the studio, the pictures

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion to me has become very disposable; I wanted to get back to craft, to clothes that could last

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: They never ask the celebrities why they don't wear their own clothes on the red carpet

Quote.Author: Vera Wang
Quote.QuoteValue: All I did my first year at Vogue was Xerox

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing stunt work is risky, but it's something I enjoy

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big sports fan. College football is my favorite

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: What I really enjoy the most is seeing what the crowd likes. I enjoy making people laugh

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nobody else that can double me - except for a doll

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: People have a good time with all the catch phrases

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I get to pick and choose exactly what I want to do

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Me being able to beat up Austin Powers? I mean, how great can that be?

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: In the film, I'm not very mobile, like in the space suit

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: In Men in Black, it was a very small character, no pun intended

Quote.Author: Verne Troyer
Quote.QuoteValue: In high school and college all my friends and my brother wrestled

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: Our freedom can be measured by the number of things we can walk away from

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: Just be honest with yourself. That opens the door

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: To change what you get you must change who you are

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn to see things as they really are, not as we imagine they are

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is not a matter of personal viewpoint

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: We are exactly where we have chosen to be

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is only skin deep, but it's a valuable asset if you're poor or haven't any sense

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: We clearly realize that freedom's inner kingdom cannot be touched by exterior attacks

Quote.Author: Vernon Howard
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a true miracle when a man finally sees himself as his only opposition

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Instead of building walls, we should be building bridges

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Prohibition didn't work in the Garden of Eden. Adam ate the apple

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the guardian of power, not its owner

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: We would betray Mexicans' hopes for change if we felt satisfied with what we've accomplished so far

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's a big misunderstanding on the value of migrants

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Every idea has its time

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Let me tell you that I love the United States

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not going to build a pressure in Mexico. We're not building walls to retain our people

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually Mexico, or always Mexico has defended itself and its territory

Quote.Author: Vicente Fox
Quote.QuoteValue: Our number one priority is to spend every peso possible to include those who are currently excluded

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: That's my opportunity to hide behind that old lady and say what I want to say

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is much too serious to be taken seriously

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to study to be a dental hygienist, marry a rich dentist, and hang it up

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's time for people to stop being so serious about everything

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to cook. I'm a sailor. And I was the eighth-grade ping-pong champion

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I found that I need to work, and I wouldn't have known that if I hadn't taken the time off

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: The fun part for me is to just really push that envelope

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: Things have always sort of happened for me. Something else always comes up

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tell people I went to the Harvard School of Comedy in front of America

Quote.Author: Vicki Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I was married for 10 minutes into a Southern family

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had the same barber since I was about 14 years old

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't care less about what anybody else has to say

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, there are people out there that want to see you fail

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew what type of player I was: a free agent, a small kid who came from a small school

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I never dreamed about being a millionaire - I dreamed about being a football player

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need any nicknames

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I kinda wanted to play receiver more

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to continue to play football and be myself

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to win football games

Quote.Author: Victor Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: Never in a million years would I think I'd play in a Super Bowl

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: Being on a television series is sort of life-altering on every level

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that acting in any medium is the same thing, it's discovering the truth in where you are

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: I had done some TV movies that were great experiences but, no, I wasn't looking to do a series

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no interest in directing. I've no talent for it

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: I think from a very young age I always have this desire to perform

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very serious about acting

Quote.Author: Victor Garber
Quote.QuoteValue: If you were to come to the set of Alias, you'd know how silly we all are. And I mean, silly
